resources.string: Peter Roman is a police officer on what should be a typical disturbance call. He encounters a teenage girl who is anything but typical. Only by defeating their own monsters will they survive the night.

Nineteen Eighty-Four is a rare work that grows more haunting as its purgatory becomes more real. Published in 1949,the book offers political satirist Orwell\'s nightmarish vision of a totalitarian world and find individuality.
